org.junit.platform.console.tasks

Interface ConsoleTask

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DisplayHelpTask, ExecuteTestsTask

    @API(value=Internal)
public interface ConsoleTask
    A task to be executed from the console.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int SUCCESS
      Exit code indicating successful execution
      static int TESTS_FAILED
      Exit code indicating test failure(s)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int execute(PrintWriter out)
      Execute this task and return an exit code.

    • Field Detail

      • SUCCESS

        static final int SUCCESS
        Exit code indicating successful execution
        See Also:

      • TESTS_FAILED

        static final int TESTS_FAILED
        Exit code indicating test failure(s)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        int execute(PrintWriter out)
     throws Exception
        Execute this task and return an exit code.
        Parameters:
        out - writer for console output
        Returns:
        exit code indicating success (0) or failure (!= 0)
        Throws:
        Exception
        See Also:
        SUCCESS
